note.p: Education: Auckland Grammar School; Auckland University College; Cambridge University. MA (NZ, 1916), PhD (1924, Cambridge)
Career: Deputy Director, Nautical Almanac Office (1925-1939); Director (1930-1936); Scientific Computing Service (1938-1950)
Memberships: Hon RSNZ (1945); Auckland Astronomical Society (Life Member); Hon FRASNZ; FRAS; FPI; FRSS
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1952-1953 vol 8 pp 97-107, plate, by H S W Massey
References: Robin J H Clark and Michael J Kelly, 'New Zealand, New Zealanders and the Royal Society' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 263-281
